description: Blending responsibly sourced, water-resistant goose down with a streamlined design, Cotopaxi's Fuego Vest is the perfect outer layer and midlayer in one. They love it for those in-between weather days that don’t quite warrant a jacket, and it’s also great as a core-warming layer under a shell while skiing. There’s an adjustable drawcord at the hem, along with two zippered hand pockets and two interior stash pockets. Their latest Fuego Vest also features an updated fit, with a little more breathing room in the hips, chest, and waist.
name: Cotopaxi Fuego Down Vest - Mens
